discussion.p: : condition_variable::wait_for is required to compute the absolute time by adding the duration value to chrono::monotonic_clock::now(), but monotonic_clock is not required to exist.
discussion.blockquote: Move to open. Associate with LWG and any other monotonic-clock related issues.
I believe that (currently Ready) addresses this issue, and that this issue should be marked NAD, solved by (assuming it moves to WP).
Leave open, but expect to be fixed by N2969 revision that Detlef is writing.
discussion.note: 2009-11-18 Moved to Tentatively NAD after 5 positive votes on c++std-lib. Rationale added below.

rationale.p: condition_variable::wait_for no longer refers to monotonic_clock, so this issue is moot.
